title: Complexity Report
description: A report containing complexity analysis for a source code file

file_path.description: Path to the analyzed source code file

components.description: List of complex components identified in the file

name.description: Name of the component (function, class, method, etc.)

line_range.description: Start and end line numbers of the component

complexity_reason.description: Explanation of why the component is considered complex

changeability_score.description: Score indicating how easy it is to make changes to this component (0-100, where 0 is impossible and 100 is super easy)

improvement_suggestions.description: Suggestions for simplifying or improving the readability of this component
